Westland.Huron Valley Lutheran High School:
Huron Valley Lutheran High School (HVLHS) is a secondary school in Westland, Michigan (Metro Detroit) affiliated with the Wisconsin Evangelical Lutheran Synod, serving the Southeast Michigan Area and supported by the 16 congregation strong 'conference of congregations'.


== Mission statement ==
"College Prep, Student-Focused, Christ-Centered"


== Administration ==
Principal: Daniel Schultz
Vice Principal: Thomas Schwartz


== Athletics ==
Sports teams compete in the Michigan Independent Athletic Conference and are categorized as Size Class D in the Michigan High School Athletic Association. Their athletic teams are called the Hawks.
